channel.title: Please help!
channel.description:
Hello please i need major help!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!@@@@@ well i made a server and i portforwarded first it worked until... my DSL stopped working and then i fixed it.... Now i cant login or make my server online. can anyone help me please? thank you very much!! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2009, 12:53:24 pm[/size][hr][quote="123kdd100"]Hello please i need major help!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!@@@@@ well i made a server and i portforwarded first it worked until... my DSL stopped working and then i fixed it.... Now i cant login or make my server online. can anyone help me please? thank you very much!![/quote]
well..... hoping for someone to help =]

without pfing?

if this happens again, go to portforward.com and find the port checker, and dl it.

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

thanks, but i’m linksys and i checked my port forward if its ok.
but i dont know how to check my port.
thanks any ways.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2009, 02:36:55 am[/size][hr]i have a question do i have to put 43594 on the external port and internal port?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2009, 02:43:55 am[/size][hr]thank you very much i checked my port and it was wrong and now i can code my server again i would do rep++ if i could but i cant sorry.

Read full topic

item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

When yoyr dsl goes down you may need to pf again

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

Hello 123kdd100,

I think your problem might be is that you don't have your server running as no one even you can connect without that running and up. Also make sure that your port forward settings is all set to 43594, and you don't have anything messed up, which type of DSL are you using? (Verizon I'm assuming) until you tell me this i cannot help you any further.

Read full topic
